title.narrative: 3.2: PROVINCIAL & MUNICIPAL MANAGEMENT OF INTEGRATED SOCIAL SERVICES

description.narrative: 3.2: Provincial governments and municipal administrations have strengthened capacity to more effectively manage and deliver integrated and convergent social services, especially in targeted, deprived areas., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Reducing Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Strengthening capacities for decentralized convergent social services

related-activity.ref: 6810/A0/07/883 STRENGTHENING CAPACITIES FOR DECENTRALIZED CONVERGENT SOCIAL SERVICES

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.2: Provincial governments and municipal administrations have strengthened capacity to more effectively manage and deliverintegrated and convergent social services, especially in targeted, deprived areas.

description.narrative: More than 400 staff from targeted municipal administrations and civil society partners in the provinces of Bie, Moxico, Uige and Luanda have their capacities strengthened in terms of provision of intersectoral responses for COVID-19 prevention, social mobilization of local communities, and implementation of socio-economic mitigation measures. This included strengthening awareness on gender equality and women’s empowerment, as well as the prevention of violence against women and children. Anemergency training programme was developed jointly by UNICEF and MASFAMU, in consultation with local partners. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2022

title.narrative: % of targeted municipal governments, which has in place a convergent integrated social services mechanism (planning, budget and coordination).(68451)
